title: Sakanwa
author: Sakanwa
content: The change of our currency note has cause alot of staving in out environment today. Should I say it's the election strategy or what, making these can of strategy that is killing our nigerians is becoming unbearable. I want to as what are we to do make sure we end this starvation and scarcity of money in our country.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: To me, what we are to do is just try and survive no matter what; the election is already around the corner, and from the look of things, the naira scarcity isn't ending till after the election. We will manage and wait till all this ends since we can't force the government to take a decision, even if a court orders them to, they don't give a listening ear to it.

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: It's an election strategy, due to what I heard, the CBN governor (Emiefele) and Muhammadu buhari are politicizing the process because they don't want tinubu to pribe and win the forth coming presidential election.My question now is that why are using politics to punish the citizens because sincerely now, the said tinubu is not affected, he has his house stocked with the new naira notes, some days back I heard in the news that buhari ordered EFCC to raid Tinubu's house and they saw a whooping sum of 400billion naira of the new currency notes, later that day the EFCC chairman came out to say there was no raiding in tinubu house and the news was fake.Now it's been so obvious that this politicians are fighting themselves and we(the citizens) are the ones suffering,Okay if they are changing the currency why not print too many notes of the new currency, now they are rejecting the old currency and we don't even have the new currency at hand, omoh the suffering is too much, this politicians are the cause of the hunger and starvation in the country all just because of their selfish interest...

comments.author: HajiBagi
comments.body: My boss, for me here be say make we find way to hustle and get money as much as we can get to use am take survive, because this ways wey person just dey see different issues and things for Nigeria no be small matter especially this new naira note matter is the worst part, even if we continue dey shout like say we no fit again, this our stingy leaders will not even listen to us, but I get advice for my friends and the youth, within some days now election will be done, this is our time to show them how powerful we are as citizens of the country, so let's vote wisely and choose a better person who will make things better for us.

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: Quote from: Sakanwa on February 21, 2023, 01:19:15 AMThe change of our currency note has cause alot of staving in out environment today. Should I say it's the election strategy or what, making these can of strategy that is killing our nigerians is becoming unbearable. I want to as what are we to do make sure we end this starvation and scarcity of money in our country.Just try and adjust to minimize the way you are using cash and always use more of transfer for your transactions. You should also adapt to this new change because I see that cashless policy has come to stay,even after the elections there might still be limited cash.I just hope things go back to normal after the elections so that life will become easy. I just pray the policy helps to get rid of vote buying so that we can all benefit from these sacrifices. This is an opportunity for Nigerians to make the right choice.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: The truth be said what the cashless policy is all about is causing scarcity of the naira notes and if there is too many notes in circulation there will always be a high inflation rate if we can thank Buhari na this present policy so go help our economy and na the change was his promise Nigerians to be this. -the more we go the less cash we will see in circulation so we have to adopt cashless and digital modes of payments. -The policy seems hard on Nigeria right now, but we have to pay the price now to secure the economy from terrorists kidnappers and other forms of criminal acts above all making every naira note pass through the bank.

comments.author: Silver005
comments.body: What we can do is to keep on praying to God for intervenes in this issue of naira redesigned because it's turning into something else ooh, because this is not the first time naria are being changed in this country why this one is totally different from the previous ones? does it mean that we can never embraced peace in this country for once, from one problem to another,so my dear is only God can help you us ooh, only him we hope and relie on.and this is time to tell them enough is enough by holding your PVC and come out on Saturday 25-2-2023 stand on your fit and no to corruption,no to bribe, and Air your view,we have suffered no be small..

comments.author: Alphakilo
comments.body: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5440630.0I must say am really really happy about this topic. Honestly, no Nigerian is currently happy with the present situation. The Naira scarcity to be precise has left many Nigerian hungry. Many families are starving, most people cant afford two square meal. The only solution i think that will help solv the present situation is by voting the right person. And also pray that our votes count. Religion and tribe should be out of the picture when casting votes. Nigerians needs a leader who pays attention to the poor masses not just on the rich men. A leader who will provide job opportunities for the youths.Nigerians can achieve all this by voting in the forthcoming election.
